name: Square Draw [Early Access]
description:
Square Draw is a new 8bit tileset drawing app.

The Square Draw was recently made, so it doesn't has a lot of options yet, but it's already usable.

Square Draw was made to create 8bits images for videos, games and more.

For now, you only can use the app using Android.

I gonna release a Windows soon, so you can use the app offline on your computer.
